name: Wheat Fighter
description:
Wheat Fighter(2D)

The greatest worst fighting game.

Made by Bread&JamGames

Rewind Mechanic works by rewinding your players jars back to their past position.     It does the most damage as well and blocks shots!

Story:

After finding a divine power that only one kingdom may possess, the nations of Stra-Ba' Reh Ja' am and Pe-Nat Buh' Tehr are at war for control of Time itself.

[10:08 PM]Now, become a warrior. Chose either Bun Li of the Pe-nat Butterlion , or Rye-yu, of the Stra- Ba Reh Jamurai, and fight not just for your side, but for glory. Who. Will. Win?

Controls

P1 = WASD(movement), V=(melee), B=(knife throw), N=(REWIND)

P2 = ARROWS (movement)   , = (melee)  . = (knife throw)  / =(REWIND)

Knife throws are directional attacks, but do less damage than melee attacks. Hitting opponents with jars do the most damage, so be sure to use jams to your advantage.

FONT CREDIT = https://www.dafont.com/

(don't run fast )

Played best on parsec type apps

Thanks for playing!
